name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in automation testing and quality assurance processes, leveraging a robust skill set that includes **Python**, **JavaScript**, and testing frameworks like **PyTest** and **Playwright**. My expertise in REST API testing and cloud services such as **Azure DevOps** and **Azure Pipelines** ensures high-quality deliverables in fast-paced environments. I effectively manage project tracking and collaboration using tools like **Jira** and **TestRail**, streamlining workflows and improving team efficiency.

I have a deep understanding of database technologies, including **Cosmos DB** and **MongoDB**, which supports my testing strategies for data-driven applications. Additionally, I am skilled in utilizing performance monitoring tools such as **Datadog** to identify and resolve issues proactively. With experience in integrating Active Directory and **Entra ID**, I ensure application security and compliance with industry standards. I bring strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, developing and implementing comprehensive test plans that align with business goals.
